DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether might practical useful investigate effectiveness yoga class relieve joint pain associate use class medication know aromatase inhibitor .
DOC.detailed_description: The study use single-arm design . All study participant assign intervention condition participate group Iyengar yoga class 90 minute twice per week 12 week ( total 24 class ) . Study outcome assess : 1 ) follow recruitment prior first yoga class ; 2 ) within two week post-intervention ( follow-up ) . Additionally , brief assessment pain conduct four week eight week start yoga class .
DOC.criteria: Have diagnose stage 0III breast cancer Have complete local and/or adjuvant breast cancer therapy ( exception hormonal therapy ) least one month previously Are postmenopausal define defined menses past 12 month Are currently prescribe aromatase inhibitor ( AI ) medication ( anastrozole , letrozole , exemestane ) Moffittaffiliated physician Report joint pain start worsened initiation AI medication Report worst pain score > 4 precede week 11point ( 010 ) numeric rating scale Have diagnose another form cancer ( except nonmelanoma skin cancer ) last five year Have uncontrolled cardiac disease , pulmonary disease , infectious disease Have physical symptom condition could make yoga unsafe ( i.e. , neck injury , dizziness , shortness breath , chest pain , severe nausea ) Have body mass index ( BMI ) > 40 kg/m^2 ( base difficulty severly obese individual may engage Iyengar yoga pose ) Have joint pain attribute inflammatory arthritic condition ( i.e. , rheumatoid arthritis , gout , pseudogout ) per medical record patient history Had surgery within past 3 month Had injection medication within last 3 month joint ( ) currently painful Are currently use corticosteroid opioid medication Are currently attend yoga class Do speak read standard English Are schedule plan discontinue AI medication next 16 week Do sufficient access Internet complete study assessment
